entry.title: Citrus Fresh Tooth Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: All Natural, Vegan Tooth Powder
Price: 10.00

Citrus Fresh tooth powder leaves your whole mouth feeling clean and fresh with a citrus taste. Perfect for traveling, our liquid-free formula leaves you worry free about oversized liquids in your carry-on! 

Features + Benefits

  • No Glycerin
  • No SLS
  • No Flouride
  • No toxins
  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How it works

The bentonite clay base not only cleans, but also draws out impurities and remineralizes your teeth. While other ingredients also help with maintaining odour and teeth health. 

How to use 

Simply wet your toothbrush and dip into powder. Brush as normal. Toothpowder will foam, but not as much as traditional toothpaste.

Ingredients

Bentonite clay, Xylitol, Baking soda, Himalayan salt, Calcium powder, Essential oils of Lemon, and Wintergreen.

entry.title: Spiced Mint Tooth Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: All Natural, Vegan Tooth Powder
Price: 10.00

Onsight Care tooth powder leaves your whole mouth feeling clean and fresh with a spiced minty taste. Perfect for traveling, our liquid-free formula leaves you worry free about oversized liquids in your carry-on! 

Features + Benefits

  • No Glycerin
  • No SLS
  • No Flouride
  • No toxins
  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How it works

The bentonite clay base not only cleans, but also draws out impurities and remineralizes your teeth. While other ingredients also help with maintaining odour and teeth health. 

How to use 

Simply wet your toothbrush and dip into powder. Brush as normal. Toothpowder will foam, but not as much as traditional toothpaste.

Ingredients

Bentonite clay, Xylitol, Baking soda, Himalayan salt, Calcium powder, Essential oils of Clove, Cinnamon, and Peppermint.

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Fennel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

Fennel was first introduced in India for oral care, where Fennel commonly serves as a mouth freshener (Mukhwas) after meals. Our Fennel toothpaste is a herbaceous, cooling, ultra refreshing formula that is also mint-free.

Does not contain Glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

93g Glass Jar.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Colloidal Silver, Sea Salt (Sel marin), Xylitol, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Oil.

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Citrus Spice Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

Our Best selling “classic” toothpaste formula. This is our take on a Thieves oil blend and it is incredible. This flavour has hints of mint, cinnamon, citrus, rosemary and clove, and is sure to make your brushing experience exceptional every time.

Does not contain Glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

93g Glass Jar.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Xylitol, Sea Salt, Colloidal Silver, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Essential Oils of Sweet Orange, Cinnamon, Clove, Rosemary, & Peppermint.

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Cinnamon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

Spicy, bold, fiery, just like you. Our unique Cinnamon flavoured toothpaste will seduce even the more adventurous brushers out there. A truly exciting toothpaste for the tastebuds.

93g Glass Jar.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Xylitol, Sea Salt, Colloidal Silver, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Cinnamon Leaf Essential Oil

entry.title: Kid's Bamboo Nylon Soft Toothbrush 4-Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrush Co
Type: Toothbrush
Price: 24.00

Multipack of 4 kid's bamboo toothbrushes: 1 Green, 1 Naked, 1 Pink, 1 White. Each brush is made with 100% bamboo handles and BPA-free DuPont nylon bristles. 

Kids Soft bristles now contain 35% Castor Bean Oil which means less carbon is used in making the bristles. 

Each brush is wrapped in a 100% biodegradable/compostable cello made from wood and cotton pulp. The packaging is 100% biodegradable/compostable and 4 brushes come in one box to reduce unnecessary packaging!

These brushes are naturally anti-bacterial and anti-microbial.

entry.title: Adult Bamboo Nylon Toothbrush - Naked
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrush Co
Type: Toothbrush
Price: 6.00

Brush Naked adult size bamboo toothbrush with a natural bamboo handle made from 100% moso bamboo and sealed in 100% compostable cello wrap made from wood and cotton pulp. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% biodegradable bamboo handle
  • BPA-free DuPont nylon bristles containing 65% Castor Bean Oil for less carbon used in production
  • Each brush is wrapped in 100% biodegradable/compostable cello which is made from wood and cotton pulp
  • Paper box packaging is compostable and biodegradable
  • Each bamboo toothbrush is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-microbial
  • Lasts 3 months (or longer)

entry.title: Bamboo Toothbrush Holder
entry.summary:
Vendor: allBambu
Type: Bamboo Toothbrush Holder
Price: 6.00

  • Made from organically grown bamboo, this eco-friendly toothbrush holder is designed to keep your bamboo toothbrush dry & bacteria-free
  • It has a drainage hole at the bottom so the water can drain properly and prevent mold build-up
  • The compact, lightweight design also makes it travel friendly. Just toss it in the bag and it's ready to go!
  • A great zero waste alternative to plastic toothbrush holders

           Bamboo Toothbrush not included with the holder

Product Specifications

  • Product Dimension: 4cm x 4cm x3cm
  • Hand wash recommended
  • Vegan & PETA Certified

entry.title: Bamboo Travel Case - Adult
entry.summary:
Vendor: allBambu
Type: Bamboo Toothbrush Travel Case
Price: 10.00

  • Take your toothbrush anywhere you go with these eco-friendly premium quality Bamboo Toothbrush Travel Cases.
  • Adult size
  • Stylish and sustainable, our bamboo travel case is perfect for keeping your toothbrush safe and clean.

 Features

  • Made from 100% Natural Bamboo Stalks
  • 100% biodegradable
  • Product Is: Organic, GMO-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-free.

Product Specifications

  • Yummy Strawberry Bubblegum flavour offers a pleasant flossing experience

  • Includes 2 refills packed in 100% compostable corn starch bags

  • For use with allBambu’s glass floss containers

entry.title: Kid's Bamboo Toothbrush - Yellow
entry.summary:
Vendor: allBambu
Type: Bamboo Toothbrush
Price: 7.00

  • Made from organically grown bamboo, our eco-friendly sustainable bamboo toothbrushes are licensed by Health Canada

  • The BPA-free, vegan, bristles are infused with premium activated white charcoal (Binchotan from Japan) and have powerful antibacterial properties that cleans, whitens and brightens your teeth naturally and guarantees you great oral hygiene

  • Each toothbrush is individually sealed in compostable PLA wrapper inside our box packaging as an additional safety and hygiene measure

  • Stylish contoured smooth handle provides maximum grip comfort, the head is favourably sized and designed for optimal tooth coverage 

Product Specifications

  • Soft Bristles
  • Vegan & PETA Certified
  • Licensed by Health Canada

entry.title: Activated Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste - Peppermint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00 - 15.00 (2 variants)

Activated charcoal has quickly grown to become the hottest ingredient in oral care in recent years, notably for its highly effective teeth whitening effects. It works like a powerful magnet for plaque, bacteria and tannins that may stain your teeth.

The Peppermint essential oil in this formula makes for the perfect refreshing brushing experience.  

Warning: This product will whiten your teeth but is EXTREMELY MESSY… Common sense required.

Does not contain glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

Ingredients 

Activated Charcoal, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Xylitol, Sea Salt, Colloidal Silver, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Peppermint Essential Oil.

entry.title: Moringa Mineral Rich Toothpaste - Forest Fresh
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 14.00

Moringa is a nutrient & mineral powerhouse. Literally the most nutrient dense plant on earth! It a super addition to your daily brushing routine.

Iodine is a member of the Halogen family (same as Fluoride) & has many amazing benefits.

Bentonite Clay is used to absorb stains and acts as a mild abrasive. Its like a detox for your mouth!

With the mineral rich properties of Moringa, the unique properties of Iodine combined with the detoxifying properties of Bentonite we believe this will be one of the best brushes you’ve ever had, In fact, we guarantee it!


Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Bentonite Clay, Colloidal Silver, Sea Salt, Xylitol, Castile Soap, Moringa Leaf, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Spirulina, Moringa Seed Oil, Iodine, Essential Oils of Juniper Berry, Rosemary, Peppermint, & Pine

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Spearmint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

The classic toothpaste flavour for the ultimate fresh breath! No funny business here.
Slightly less sweet than our other formulas, the Spearmint toothpaste packs a punch.

Does not contain glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Xylitol, Sea Salt, Colloidal Silver, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Spearmint Essential Oil.

entry.title: Crush + Brush Tablets - Mint Charcoal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 14.00

Nelson Naturals Crush + Brush Tablets - Mint

A  simple to use toxin free toothpaste tablet.

With our glass jar packaging, there is no plastic tube to add to the ever growing plastic crisis!

These little tablets are ideal for travel and use less water than traditional toothpaste. 
Vegan, Gluten Free, Plastic Free and Cruelty Free!

How do I use C+B?

Because C&B is so versatile you can use them in many different ways depending on where you are. 
Sometimes you have a brush, sometimes you don't.
Sometimes it's convenient to  spit, sometimes it's not.
No matter where you are or what you're doing C&B has you covered.

For standard use:
1. Place tablet in mouth 
2. Crush with teeth 
3. Experience effervescent fizzing and foaming
4. Wet brush and brush normally

100% Food Grade Ingredients

In an industry filled with toxins and untested ingredients, C&B only uses pure and quality food grade raw materials.

Ingredients

Calcium carbonate, sodium bicarbonate, activated charcoal (charcoal SKU), xylitol, potassium bitartrate (cream of tartar), menthol, sel marin (sea salt), gum arabic, magnesium stearate, silica, microcrystalline cellulose, *spearmint flavour, *peppermint flavour. *organic ingredient
